title: Online Project-Based Mathematics Education for Public Health Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical and data interpretation skills, along with foundational knowledge of public health concepts
context.additional_context: Data analysis and policy proposal project for solving real-world public health issues in the community

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose community health issues by mathematically analyzing public health data
Learners can develop practical policy proposals for solving public health problems through Problem-Based Learning (PBL)
Learners can experience data-driven decision-making processes through collaboration with actual stakeholders
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
